attributes.action: Close down the Scottish parliament and return all powers to Westminster
attributes.additional_details: The Scottish Parliament is acting undemocratically and now has to be closed down and all powers returned to westminster
attributes.background: the Scottish Parliament has failed and now needs to be closed down and all powers returned to Westminster

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision on whether or not devolution should continue is a matter for people of Scotland, not the UK Government or Parliament.
